title: House at land value for sale
details:
The perfect plot of land for your residence in a highly residential, quiet and peaceful neighborhood. Conveniently located in the center of Colombo 03

This area contains a 18.3 perches land with an old house which can be renovated or reconstructed according to your motive.

Easy access to Marine drive and Galle road. Schools, banks, hospitals, restaurants and other basic amenities within close range.

Enjoy life to the fullest in your dream home.

REF ID : - LPLS077
